data.name: Litwick

attacks.name: Flickering Flames
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Asleep.

data.flavorText: While shining a light and pretending to be a guide, it leeches off the life force of any who follow it.

data.name: Litwick

attacks.name: Singe
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Burned.

data.flavorText: Its flame is usually out, but it starts shining when it absorbs life force from people or Pokémon.

data.name: Litwick
data.flavorText: While shining a light and pretending to be a guide, it leaches off the life force of any who follow it.

data.name: Litwick

attacks.name: Surprise Attack
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

data.flavorText: Its flame is usually out, but it starts shining when it absorbs life force from people or Pokémon.

data.name: Litwick

attacks.name: Find a Friend
attacks.text: Search your deck for a Fire Pokémon, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

data.flavorText: While shining a light and pretending to be a guide, it leeches off the life force of any who follow it.

data.name: Litwick

attacks.name: Find a Friend
attacks.text: Search your deck for a Fire Pokémon, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.

data.flavorText: While shining a light and pretending to be a guide, it leeches off the life force of any who follow it.

data.name: Litwick

attacks.name: Scorch
attacks.text: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Burned.

data.flavorText: The flame on its head keeps its body slightly warm. This Pokémon takes lost children by the hand to guide them to the spirit world.

data.name: Litwick

attacks.name: Call for Family
attacks.text: Search your deck for a Basic Pokémon and put it onto your Bench. Shuffle your deck afterward.

data.flavorText: Litwick shines a light that absorbs the life energy of people and Pokémon, which becomes the fuel that it burns.

data.name: Litwick

attacks.name: Slightly Simmer
attacks.text: Search your deck for up to 2 cards and discard them. Shuffle your deck afterward.

data.flavorText: Litwick shines a light that absorbs the life energy of people and Pokémon, which becomes the fuel that it burns.

data.name: Litwick

attacks.name: Trip Over
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 more damage.

data.flavorText: While shining a light and pretending to be a guide, it leeches off the life force of any who follow it.

data.name: Litwick

attacks.name: Searing Flame
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Burned.

data.flavorText: Litwick shines a light that absorbs the life energy of people and Pokémon, which becomes the fuel it burns.

data.name: Litwick

attacks.name: Teleportation Burst
attacks.text: Switch this Pokémon with 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

data.flavorText: While shining a light and pretending to be a guide, it leaches off the life force of any who follow it.

data.name: Litwick

attacks.name: Haunt
attacks.text: Put 1 damage counter on your opponent's Active Pokémon.

data.flavorText: Litwick shines a light that absorbs the life energy of people and Pokémon, which becomes the fuel that it burns.

data.name: Litwick

attacks.name: Kindling Panic
attacks.text: Discard the top card of your opponent's deck.

data.flavorText: The flame on its head keeps its body slightly warm. This Pokémon takes lost children by the hand to guide them to the spirit world.

data.name: Litwick

attacks.name: Firebreathing
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 more damage.

data.flavorText: The younger the life this Pokémon absorbs, the brighter and eerier the flame on its head burns.

data.name: Litwick

attacks.name: Call for Family
attacks.text: Search your deck for a Basic Pokémon and put it onto your Bench. Then, shuffle your deck.

data.flavorText: While shining a light and pretending to be a guide, it leeches off the life-force of any who follow it.

data.name: Litwick

attacks.name: Brighten and Burn
attacks.text: Look at the top card of your deck. You may discard that card.

data.flavorText: Litwick shines a light that absorbs the life energy of people and Pokémon, which becomes the fuel that it burns.

data.name: Litwick

attacks.name: Brighten and Burn
attacks.text: Look at the top card of your deck. You may discard that card.

data.flavorText: Litwick shines a light that absorbs the life energy of people and Pokémon, which becomes the fuel that it burns.
